videos.title: Get to know me
videos.description: An introductory video where I share my background,experience, and what inspires my work.

videos.title: Avant Garde
videos.description: A short talking-head introduction to Avant Garde, a premium shortlet apartment in Lekki Phase 1, highlighting its features, lifestyle appeal, and guest experience.

videos.title: Osun State Road Network
videos.description: A street interview where citizens share their opinions and experiences regarding the newly built road network in Osun State, highlighting the impact on daily commutes and local community life.

videos.title: Fewa/Homex Exhibition Clarification
videos.description: A short video where a presenter discusses key highlights of the Fewa/Homex furniture and home interiors exhibition, showcasing designs, trends, and exhibition details.

videos.title: Oasis
videos.description: A fashion video showcasing Oasis outfits in an indoor setting, combining dressing demonstration with subtle storytelling and premium editing techniques.

videos.title: My Home and Me
videos.description: A UGC-style campaign video for SmartGlass Africa built around a phone call concept between the main character and his home, created as part of the October ads campaign.
videos.skillDemonstrated: UGC Storytelling / Campaign Acting / Concept Delivery

videos.title: Eko Ile
videos.description: A storytelling-style UGC video promoting Eko Ile shortlet apartments, positioning it as a calm and serene escape spot in Lagos for comfort and relaxation.
videos.skillDemonstrated: Lifestyle Storytelling / Property UGC / Brand Narrative

videos.title: CyberTech
videos.description: A short cybersecurity awareness video demonstrating key online safety practices and educating viewers on protecting personal and organizational data.
